mapper.sql: ci.CHARGE_ID "chargeId", c.CONSIGN_NO "consignNo", cd.CAR_BRAND "carBrand", cd.CAR_MODEL "carModel", cd.AMOUNT "amount", cd.CHASSIS_NO "chassisNo", date_format(c.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') "createDate", date_format(cd.DESPATCH_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') "despatchDate", c.LOCATION_TO "locationTo", c.RECEIVE_ORG_NAME "receiveOrgName", c.CONSIGN_ORG_NAME "consignOrgName", dp.main_drive "mainDrive", dp.MAIN_DRIVE_PHONE "mainDrivePhone",r.CO_PILOT "coPilot", c.LOCATION_FROM "locationFrom",r.CARRIER_NAME "carrierName",r.TRANSPORT_TOOL "transportTool", ci.FREIGHT_RATES "freightRates",ci.ADVANCES "advances",ci.PREPAID_OIL_CARD "prepaidOilCard", ci.QUALITY_LOSS "qualityLoss",ci.SUBSIDY "subsidy",ci.REVERSE_CHARGE "reverseCharge",ci.MIS_COSTS "misCosts", ci.GPS_PAYMENT "gpsPayment",ci.CHARGE_AMOUNT "chargeAmount", ci.MODIFY_USER_NAME "modifyUserName", date_format(ci.MODIFY_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') "modifyDate", ci.KILO_PRICE "kiloPrice",ci.KILOMETERS "kilometers",ci.OIL_COST "oilCost",ci.SERVICE_RATE "serviceRate", ci.OIL_RATIO "oilRatio",ci.OIL_PRICE "oilPrice",ci.OIL_SUBSIDY "oilSubsidy"

ci.CHARGE_ID "chargeId", ci.tamount "amount", dp.main_drive "mainDrive", dp.MAIN_DRIVE_PHONE "mainDrivePhone",r.CO_PILOT "coPilot", ci.LOCATION_FROM "locationFrom", ci.LOCATION_TO "locationTo", date_format(dp.MODIFY_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') "despatchDate", r.CARRIER_NAME "carrierName",r.TRANSPORT_TOOL "transportTool", ci.FREIGHT_RATES "freightRates",ci.ADVANCES "advances",ci.PREPAID_OIL_CARD "prepaidOilCard", ci.QUALITY_LOSS "qualityLoss",ci.SUBSIDY "subsidy",ci.REVERSE_CHARGE "reverseCharge",ci.MIS_COSTS "misCosts", ci.GPS_PAYMENT "gpsPayment",ci.CHARGE_AMOUNT "chargeAmount", ci.MODIFY_USER_NAME "modifyUserName", date_format(ci.MODIFY_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') "modifyDate", ci.KILO_PRICE "kiloPrice",ci.KILOMETERS "kilometers",ci.OIL_COST "oilCost",ci.SERVICE_RATE "serviceRate", ci.OIL_RATIO "oilRatio",ci.OIL_PRICE "oilPrice",ci.OIL_SUBSIDY "oilSubsidy",ci.SOURCE_CHARGE_ID "sourceChargeId"
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_charge_info(charge_id,org_id,charge_type,consign_detail_id, despatch_plan_id,contract_id,FREIGHT_RATES,charge_fstate,MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_DATE,MODIFY_USER_NAME,CHARGE_AMOUNT)
select cc.charge_id,#{despatchPlan.orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},cc.charge_type, cc.consign_detail_id,cc.despatch_plan_id,cc.contract_id,cc.FREIGHT_RATES, '00',#{despatchPlan.modifyUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},now(),#{despatchPlan.modifyUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},cc.FREIGHT_RATES*cc.amount from (SELECT replace(uuid(),'-','') as "charge_id", '02' as "charge_type", cd.consign_detail_id, cd.amount, dp.despatch_plan_id, ct.contract_id, ct.FREIGHT_RATES from tb_consign_detail cd left join tb_consign c on cd.consign_id = c.consign_id left join tb_despatch_plan dp on cd.despatch_plan_id = dp.despatch_plan_id left join td_record_info r on dp.record_id = r.record_id left join ( select con.contract_id,con.FREIGHT_RATES,cd.consign_detail_id from tb_contract con,tb_consign_detail cd, tb_consign c,tb_despatch_plan dp,td_record_info r where con.contract_type='02' and c.ORG_ID = con.org_id and cd.despatch_plan_id = dp.despatch_plan_id and dp.record_id = r.record_id and con.carrier_name = r.carrier_name and cd.CONSIGN_ID = c.CONSIGN_ID and c.LOCATION_FROM = con.LOCATION_FROM and c.LOCATION_TO = con.LOCATION_TO and (cd.car_brand = con.car_brand or con.car_brand ='其他') and (cd.car_model = con.car_model or con.car_model ='其他') and cd.DESPATCH_DATE between con.CONTRACT_START and con.CONTRACT_END ) ct on ct.consign_detail_id = cd.consign_detail_id where cd.consign_detail_id in
#{consignDetailIds[${index}], jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by cd.consign_detail_id ) cc

insert into tb_charge_info(charge_id,org_id,charge_type, despatch_plan_id,charge_fstate,MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_DATE,MODIFY_USER_NAME,location_from,location_to,tamount) select replace(uuid(),'-',''),#{despatchPlan.orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'03', dp.despatch_plan_id,'00',#{despatchPlan.modifyUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},now(),#{despatchPlan.modifyUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{despatchPlan.locationFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{despatchPlan.locationTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},SUM(cd.amount) from tb_consign_detail cd,tb_despatch_plan dp where cd.despatch_plan_id = dp.despatch_plan_id and dp.despatch_plan_id = #{despatchPlan.despatchPlanId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by dp.despatch_plan_id
mapper.update:
update tb_charge_info ci set tamount = ( select sum(cd.amount) from tb_consign_detail cd where cd.despatch_plan_id = ci.despatch_plan_id group by cd.despatch_plan_id ) where ci.charge_type = '03' and ci.SOURCE_CHARGE_ID is null and ci.despatch_plan_id in
#{oldPlanId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select ci.charge_id from tb_charge_info ci where (ci.tamount = 0 or ci.tamount is null) and ci.SOURCE_CHARGE_ID is null and ci.charge_type = '03' and ci.despatch_plan_id in
#{oldPlanId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_CHARGE_INFO (CHARGE_ID, ORG_ID, CHARGE_TYPE, FREIGHT_RATES, FREIGHT, ADVANCES, PREPAID_OIL_CARD, QUALITY_LOSS, SUBSIDY, REVERSE_CHARGE, MIS_COSTS, GPS_PAYMENT, CHARGE_AMOUNT, MAIN_DRIVE, CO_PILOT, TRANPORT_TOOL, DESPATCH_PLAN_ID, CONSIGN_ID, CONTRACT_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID ) values (#{chargeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freightRates,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advances,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prepaidOilCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualityLoss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subsidy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reverseCharge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{misCosts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsPayment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainDrive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coPilot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranportTool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{despatchPlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into TB_CHARGE_INFO
CHARGE_ID,
ORG_ID,
CHARGE_TYPE,
FREIGHT_RATES,
FREIGHT,
ADVANCES,
PREPAID_OIL_CARD,

CO_PILOT,
TRANPORT_TOOL,
DESPATCH_PLAN_ID,
CONSIGN_ID,
CONTRACT_ID,
MODIFY_DATE,
MODIFY_USER_ID,
